text: Aur munafiqon bhi maloom kerley jin say kaha gaya kay aao Allah ki raah mein jihad kero ya kafiron ko hatao to woh kehney lagay kay agar hum laraee jantay hotay to zaroor sath detay woh uss din ba nisbat eman kay kufur say boht qarib thay apney mun say woh baaten banatay hain jo inn kay dilon mein nahi aur Allah Taalaa khoob janta hai jisay woh chupatay hain
